channel.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
channel.description:
I just had a quick look at the "level designs" page and a few of them have places you cannot reach normally and where not in the old half-life 1. Looking at the images from "Inbound" there is alot of doors and corridors that could only be accesed through No-clipping.
This leads me to imagine a few easter eggs might be placed around. (not that i am suggesting. im just guessing!!) :bulb: :rolleyes:
No-clip is such a good explorers item...!

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: chipstix4
item.description:
Dias:

Have you tried using your thumb?

Tbh its instant reaction to use my index finger straight away because i use it for reloading, flashlight and spraying tags

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
intooblivion:

My hand is 10 inches from thumb to pinky spread out.

https://www.iruler.net/

waits for everyone else to measure their hands

Ooh, that’s a handy app. Damn near 9 inches for me. Now if only there was a relationship between that and the obvious…

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
This has turned into a thread that was around pre-crash. I can’t be having with any WASD OR arrow keys. right mouse for forwards, Left Ctrl for back and Z,X for left, right respectively.

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
Numeric keypad is the pwn for FPS controls. Plenty of keys on the keypad for the first three fingers, and the thumb’s got a choice of three without having to crook itself over the first row. The pinkie’s got access to the arrow keys and the insert-pgdn block for less commonly-used stuff. Only problem is, it’s a bit cramped if you don’t have much room to move the keyboard around.

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
chipstix4:

Well i must have small hands then becuase when i have my hands on the WASD keys i have to take them off to press H. so thats why i bind to V so i can keep my hand on WASD keys and press V with my index finger.

Have you tried using your thumb?

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Grand_General_Hot:

WASD keys annoyed me for the longest of times, I was so used to arrow keys from the early days.

cool story bro :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
bind mouse3 noclip

problem solved.

Also I have bind mouse4 “impulse 101” and bind mouse5 notarget

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Jokerine:

I refuse to believe that. My hands are 6.1 inches long, and I always thought they were huge.

I’m talking from the tip of my thumb to the tip of the little one. As in, stretched out across a set of keys.

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
Hahaha, I usually do something similar, but I’m more of a coward. I first finish the game on easy mode, running the whole time and without paying much attention to detail; then, I go on normal (or hard) mode and take my time to explore my surroundings. But I’m not very into noclipping - I prefer notarget instead

Read full topic

item.title: Good no-clipping fun!!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I’ll do like I usually do, finish the game with the most cheats possible on easy mode, then play it on hard with no cheats.

Read full topic
